info.name: IONOS Logging Service REST API
info.description:
The Logging Service offers a centralized platform to collect and store logs from various systems and applications. It includes tools to search, filter, visualize, and create alerts based on your log data.
This API provides programmatic control over logging pipelines, enabling you to create new pipelines or modify existing ones. It mirrors the functionality of the DCD visual tool, ensuring a consistent experience regardless of your chosen interface.

request.description:
Creates a new Key.

The full Key needs to be provided to create the object.
Optional data will be filled with defaults or left empty.

response.name: Key successfully created.

query.description: The first element (of the total list of elements) to include in the response. Use this parameter together with the limit for pagination.
The maximum number of elements to return. Use this parameter together with the offset for pagination.
The field to order the results by. If not provided, the results will be ordered by the default field.

request.description:
This endpoint enables retrieving all Pipelines using
pagination and optional filters.

response.name: Returned all requested Pipelines successfully.

request.description:
Ensures that the CentralLogging with the provided ID is created or modified.
The full CentralLogging needs to be provided to ensure
(either update or create) the CentralLogging. Non present data will
only be filled with defaults or left empty, but not take
previous values into consideration.

response.name: CentralLogging successfully updated.
